languages.text: "Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."
languages.original_text: "Все будет внесено в протокол — за любым словом может таиться ложь или истина".

traits.locale_text: "Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."
"Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."
"Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."
"Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."
"Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."
"Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."

languages.text: "Все будет внесено в протокол — за любым словом может таиться ложь или истина".
« Tout sera scrupuleusement consigné dans nos archives, on ne sait jamais quel mot peut contenir une vérité ou un mensonge d'importance capitale. »
languages.original_text: "Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."

traits.locale_text: « Tout sera scrupuleusement consigné dans nos archives, on ne sait jamais quel mot peut contenir une vérité ou un mensonge d'importance capitale. »

languages.text: «Todo se añade al registro; nunca se sabe qué palabra puede esconder una verdad o mentira crucial».
languages.original_text: "Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."

traits.locale_text: «Todo se añade al registro; nunca se sabe qué palabra puede esconder una verdad o mentira crucial».

languages.text: “所有的一切都要记录下来，你永远想象不到哪个词可能会包含关键的真相或谎言。”
languages.original_text: "Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."

traits.locale_text: “所有的一切都要记录下来，你永远想象不到哪个词可能会包含关键的真相或谎言。”

languages.text: 「全ては記録される…どの言葉に重大な真実や嘘が含まれているか、まだ分からないんだ」
languages.original_text: "Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."

traits.locale_text: 「全ては記録される…どの言葉に重大な真実や嘘が含まれているか、まだ分からないんだ」

languages.text: "Es kommt alles in die Akten. Man weiß nie, welches Wort eine entscheidende Wahrheit oder Lüge enthalten könnte."
languages.original_text: "Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."

traits.locale_text: "Es kommt alles in die Akten. Man weiß nie, welches Wort eine entscheidende Wahrheit oder Lüge enthalten könnte."

languages.text: "Her şey kayıtlara geçecek. Hangi sözcükte mühim bir hakikat ya da yalan yattığı asla bilemezsin."
languages.original_text: "Everything will be added to the record — you never know which word might contain a crucial truth or lie."
